knimeNode.name: Spacy Tokenizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node converts a string column with raw text to a Knime Document format, using its own tokenizer based on the selected spaCy model.

fullDescription.intro: The node converts a string column with raw text to a Knime Document format, using its own tokenizer based on the selected spaCy model.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: Select a String column that will be tokenized and converted to Document.
If checked, the document column will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as a new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.

tab.name: Model
tab.option: Pick one of the official spaCy models, or refer to a custom model stored in the filesystem. In the latter case refer to a folder with meta.json and config files.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
